entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning and ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
